channel.title: Windmill? (Help)
channel.description: Hey I was about to make the Windmill in Zanaris But then I thought OK I can get the grain to work with the Object But at the end you know in Real Runescape The flour Appears? How would I make that OBJECT appear? I need it so I can use pot.

item.title: Windmill? (Help)
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

How would I add that in the Code?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 01:42:03 PM[/size][hr]Because to add an Object you have to place it under the NewObjects() But that would be adding it Permantly How would I make it dissapear when you use with pot? And make it Appear when you use the Switches ontop.

Read full topic
